certification_id.certification_statement:
This is to certify that the management system of Vietnam Textiles Joint Stock Co., located in the Tan Binh Industrial Park, Ho Chi Minh City, has been found to conform to the Social Accountability Management System Standard: SA8000:2014.

The scope of certification includes the manufacturing, sewing, and finishing of woven and knitted garments. This certification confirms that the facility adheres to international labor standards regarding: Child Labor, Forced Labor, Health and Safety, Freedom of Association, Discrimination, Disciplinary Practices, Working Hours, and Remuneration.

Valid until: June 20, 2027

translations.product_description: Crafted from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton, this classic crew-neck t-shirt combines everyday comfort with responsible sourcing. The soft, breathable fabric is garment-dyed for a rich, lasting color and pre-shrunk for a consistent fit wash after wash.
translations.ingredient_statement: Shell: cotton, elastane. Collar and cuffs: cotton.

certification_id.certification_statement:
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLIANCE (Scope Certificate)

Registration No: GOTS-YB-2025-01

This is to certify that Your Brand Corporation, located at 123 Main Street, New York, NY, has been inspected and assessed according to the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) Version 7.0.

It is confirmed that the processing steps, garments, and products listed in the Annex of this certificate conform with this standard. This certificate is valid until Feb 1, 2027, subject to continued compliance through annual on-site audits.

The company Your Brand Corporation is granted authorization to use the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® mark, based on our test report R-2026-YB01.

The results of the inspection made according to STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX®, Annex 4, product class I (Articles for babies and toddlers) show that the goods meet the human-ecological requirements of the STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX® presently established in Annex 4.

The certified articles include: knitted garments made of 100% cotton, 100% cashmere, and blends thereof, including all accessories such as sewing threads, buttons, and woven labels. This certificate is valid until January 31, 2027.

translations.brand_content:
About Us

Your Brand is a leader in the design, marketing, and distribution of premium lifestyle products, including apparel, accessories, and home furnishings. Our reputation and distinctive image have been consistently developed across an expanding number of products, brands, sales channels, and international markets.

Our Products & Brands

Our distinctive brand image has been consistently developed across an expanding number of products, price tiers, and markets. Our products, which include apparel, accessories, and collections for men and women, as well as childrenswear and home furnishings, are among the most recognised consumer brands. We combine consumer insights with our design, marketing, and imaging skills to offer broad lifestyle product collections with a unified vision.
